name: Consolidated Edison, Inc.
description: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) is one of the largest energy companies in the United States, providing a range of services related to electric, gas, and steam utilities. Founded in 1824, Con Edison has a rich history and has evolved to meet the changing needs of its customers. The company primarily operates in New York City and Westchester County, delivering electricity to over 3.8 million customers and gas to more than 1.1 million customers. Con Edison is committed to providing safe, reliable, and affordable energy while investing in sustainable practices and renewable energy sources. The company is actively working towards reducing its carbon footprint and enhancing energy efficiency. In recent years, Con Edison has expanded its initiatives in clean energy technology, including solar and energy storage solutions, to support New York's ambitious climate goals. As a leader in the energy sector, Con Edison plays a vital role in the transition towards a more sustainable energy future, ensuring that its infrastructure adapts to the evolving demands of the energy landscape.
